subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The sprint standout Mark Cavendish won the Milan-San Remo cycling classic in his debut, beating Heinrich Haussler of Germany in a photo finish. Lance Armstrong, riding the first European race in his comeback from three and a half years of retirement, dropped back and out of contention in an uphill climb shortly before the finish. milan.
